item.description:
RIVA'S Annual Summer Picnic
Sunday, August 12th
Noon-4pm
Colt State Park, Bristol, RI Sites 33 & 34

*Check the Rhode Island Vegan Awareness website or facebook page for rain date information.

Join us for a day of great vegan food, live music and games! Fun for the whole family!
This is a POTLUCK EVENT. Please bring a VEGAN* food item that can serve 10 people.
*In order for a food item to be considered vegan, it must contain no meat, fish, dairy, eggs or honey. We ask that this guideline be strictly adhered to, as many people in attendance have made a personal commitment not to consume the above products.
COST OF THE EVENT:
With Potluck dish - $5 per person
Without Potluck dish - $10 per person
Please bring a serving utensil with your dish if needed!

LIVE MUSIC PROVIDED BY CHILL-AXE!
Come rock out to great tunes, or bring an instrument and join the fun!
Learn more about Chill-Axe at:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Chill-Axe/231738356916229

Some games will be provided but please feel free to bring along any family friendly outdoor games to add to the fun!

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: RIVA'S Annual Summer Picnic
